name: A Cmd Story Game
description:
A Cmd Story Game
A Game Overview


A Small Game Where You Edit A Story By Changing The Name Of A Variable Like A Username Of Someone To Banana Wouldn't That Be Funny?
Example:
Once Upon A Time There Was This Man Called...
>Stopid
There Was This Man Called Stopid... 

Warning:
Please Don't Judge...
It's Not A Serious Game...
Just Made It For Fun...
